basics.name: Senior Manufacturing Engineering
basics.label: Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Manufacturing Engineer with expertise in Web Handling, Printing, Extrusion, MS Office, Die Design, and many more.

work.summary: Started as a Mechanical engineer in the design department, moved to a Manufacturing and Quality Engineer, then process improvement engineer and now quality engineer supervisor.
Implemented a database package for the nuclear power plant historical design calculations. The new system met the Nuclear Regulatory Commission standards.
The project was on a new precision design for plastic molding injection where the dimensions and shape were fixed.
Designed, developed, and implemented databases for tracking student's behaviors.

work.company: Sharx Night Club and Sports Bar
work.summary: Responsible for employees during high volume business hours.
Designed, built, and managed the construction of Renaissance Fairs, theaters, and large seasonal displays for malls.

references.name: Nuclear Management Company
references.summary: Awarded the PRIDE award three times for various activities above and beyond job expectations.

references.name: North American Carousel
references.summary: Received commendations from Virginia and Wisconsin for the level of detail given to projects.

references.name: ISD 287
references.summary: Certified CPR & First Aid, American Red Cross, Certified
